See also: Crear

Asturian

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from Latin creāre.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /kɾeˈaɾ/ [kɾeˈaɾ]
  • Rhymes: -aɾ
  • Syllabification: cre‧ar

Verb

[edit]

crear (first-person singular indicative present creo, past participle creáu)

  1. to create

Conjugation

[edit]
Conjugation of crear
infinitive crear
gerund creando
past participle m creáu, f creada, n creao, m pl creaos, f pl creaes
person first singular
yo 		second singular
tu 		third singular
él/elli 		first plural
nosotros/nós 		second plural
vosotros/vós 		third plural
ellos
indicative present creo crees crea creamos creáis creen
imperfect creaba creabes creaba creábemos, creábamos creabeis, creabais creaben
preterite creé creasti, creesti creó creemos creastis, creestis crearon
pluperfect creare, creara creares, crearas creare, creara creáremos, creáramos creareis, crearais crearen, crearan
future crearé crearás creará crearemos crearéis crearán
conditional crearía crearíes crearía crearíemos, crearíamos crearíeis, crearíais crearíen
subjunctive present cree crees, creas cree creemos creéis creen, crean
imperfect creare, creara creares, crearas creare, creara creáremos, creáramos creareis, crearais crearen, crearan
imperative — crea — — creái —

Synonyms

[edit]
  • (to create): facer, producir

Catalan

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from Latin creāre. Doublet of criar (“to raise”).

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): (Central, Balearic) [kɾeˈa]
  • IPA(key): (Valencia) [kɾeˈaɾ]
  • Audio (Catalonia):(file)
  • Rhymes: -a(ɾ)

Verb

[edit]

crear (first-person singular present creo, first-person singular preterite creí, past participle creat); root stress: (Central, Valencia, Balearic) /e/

  1. to create

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of crear (first conjugation)

gerund creant
past participle masculine feminine
singular creat creada
plural creats creades
person singular plural
first second third first second third
indicative jo tu ell/ella
vostè 		nosaltres
nós 		vosaltres
vós 		ells/elles
vostès
present creo crees crea creem creeu creen
imperfect creava creaves creava creàvem creàveu creaven
future crearé crearàs crearà crearem creareu crearan
preterite creí creares creà creàrem creàreu crearen
conditional crearia crearies crearia crearíem crearíeu crearien
subjunctive jo tu ell/ella
vostè 		nosaltres
nós 		vosaltres
vós 		ells/elles
vostès
present creï creïs creï creem creeu creïn
imperfect creés creessis creés creéssim creéssiu creessin
imperative — tu vostè nosaltres vosaltres
vós 		vostès
affirmative — crea creï creem creeu creïn
negative (no) — no creïs no creï no creem no creeu no creïn

Related terms

[edit]
  • creació
  • creador

Further reading

[edit]
  • “crear”, in Diccionari de la llengua catalana [Dictionary of the Catalan Language] (in Catalan), second edition, Institute of Catalan Studies [Catalan: Institut d'Estudis Catalans], April 2007

Interlingua

[edit]

Verb

[edit]

crear

  1. to create (to cause to exist)

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of crear
infinitive crear
participle present perfect
creante create
active simple perfect
present crea ha create
past creava habeva create
future creara habera create
conditional crearea haberea create
imperative crea —
passive simple perfect
present es create ha essite create
past esseva create habeva essite create
future essera create habera essite create
conditional esserea create haberea essite create
imperative sia create —

Occitan

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from Latin creāre.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • Audio (Béarn):(file)

Verb

[edit]

crear

  1. to create

Conjugation

[edit]

This verb needs an inflection-table template.

Related terms

[edit]
  • creacion

Portuguese

[edit]

Verb

[edit]

crear (first-person singular present creio, first-person singular preterite creei, past participle creado)

  1. pre-reform spelling (used until 1943 in Brazil and 1911 in Portugal) of criar

Usage notes

[edit]

This spelling coexisted with criar.

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of crear (e becomes ei when stressed) (See Appendix:Portuguese verbs)

First-person
(eu) 		Second-person
(tu) 		Third-person
(ele / ela / você) 		First-person

Feminine creada creadas

Pluperfect creara crearas creara creáramos creáreis crearam
Future crearei crearás creará crearemos creareis crearão
Conditional crearia crearias crearia crearíamos crearíeis creariam

Future crear creares crear crearmos creardes crearem
Imperative
Affirmative creia creie creemos creai creiem
Negative (não) não creies não creie não creemos não creeis não creiem

1Brazilian Portuguese.
2European Portuguese.

Spanish

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from Latin creāre. Compare the inherited doublet criar (“to raise”).

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /kɾeˈaɾ/ [kɾeˈaɾ]
  • Audio (Colombia):(file)
  • Rhymes: -aɾ
  • Syllabification: cre‧ar

Verb

[edit]

crear (first-person singular present creo, first-person singular preterite creé, past participle creado)

  1. (transitive) to create
    Synonym: generar
    • 2002, Carlos Sánchez del Río, El significado de la física, Editorial Complutense, →ISBN, page 102:
      Un imán en reposo crea un campo magnético y si se mueve crea además un campo eléctrico.
      A magnet at rest creates a magnetic field and if it moves it also creates an electric field.

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of crear (See Appendix:Spanish verbs)

gerund creando
past participle masculine feminine
singular creado creada
plural creados creadas
singular plural

1Mostly obsolete, now mainly used in legal language.
2Argentine and Uruguayan voseo prefers the tú form for the present subjunctive.
